Text: Is there any way you can get a certificate for any of these courses?
i got a .bin and .cue file, how do i play these? cant find a program to do it, vlc wont. help please

You need to mount iron-lcdawbs.cue to view the video files.

Install Daemon tools then double click the .cue file and a window will pop up with all the video files. 

If the window doesn't pop then just goto My Computer and right click on the mounted drive and "Open in new window" 

Easy as pieee.

Thanks MsB1982!

Thank you, MsB. SO MUCH!! ; )
